answers.answer: Normally they take you right in and deliver the baby. But maybe it's just super early stages. When did they say they would induce?? I'm not certain what you can do but it normally raises your blood pressure.
He didn't say, I have a follow up tomorrow for my test results. He also said I'm dilated a finger tip. Any ladies know how many cm that is?

I delivered my baby at 35 weeks 6 days because I had pre-eclampsia .. I had been very swollen for weeks and it was just getting worse I went to my doc app. On a monday becausr of how swollen I was and it hurt .. They checked my bp and it was very high I cant remember the #s so my doc started gettinf my papers ready and sent me to l&d to get checked and sure thing they kept me I had to be induced and had my baby March 12th I was due April 10th
Aw that's actually my birthday :) and did your baby have to stay at nicu for very long? :/ im only scared because I don't want to leave my baby at the hospital. Did you have to have a c section?

If you are not spilling protein in ur urine it's probably Gestational hypertension that can turn into preeclampsia. Preeclampsia is typically diagnosed by protein in urine. I am currently dealing with it now and my dr is just trying to get me to 37 weeks without it turning. I am going to be 37 weeks on Thursday and am currently in the hospital getting monitored because last night I was sick with dbl vision, vomiting, headache, bp 150/102 And much more. So as long as nothing happens between now and Thursday I should be having my lil man on Thursday :-D can wait.
It might be 1 cm... Not really sure tho.
Jesshat oh congrats!
I hope all goes well with your birth :)
Thanks! I hope everything goes smoothly for you.
How do you know your leaking?  I think I might nee but not sure. ..

Angelbabymike I actually didn't know I was leaking. I had noticed that my underwear was a little more wet then normal, but I thought that was part of being pregnant. I'm dialated a finger tip so like 1 or 2 cm? So I guess I lost my mucus plus without  knowing it. To be honest I've been leaking for a while, but my old Dr just never told me..Still needing more encouragemant from more ladies with pre eclampsia experience! Thanks ladies!

i had pre eckamsia  its no fun im sorry to hear that.... do u have protine in ur urine. they should have already induced i f i were u id complaine cus its not good for u nor ur baby plz let me no how it goes
i got taken right in but they found it on my due date so urs could be different well good luck mamma hope all goes well for you n ur baby!! :)
So you mean right when they find out I have it they induce me?? :((

Had PE with our son and worried I'll have it this time around.  They don't tend to need to do anything until your bp gets over 140/90 with the lower number being most important.  I was on bed rest from 34 weeks to keep my bp down so I'd advise starting that now.  They did a c-section at 38 weeks as my bp got too high and bub was no where near ready to come (eg sitting very high and not engaged). Magnesium oil spray to rub on your skin is recommended - better absorbed than by taking pills.  It helps bp. They give you injections of it if you get too dangerous like having seizures etc but don't worry that is a rare complication that is almost never allows to get that far in Western countries. So plenty of rest for you, magnesium oil, and do have a c-section birth plan just in case as I was shocked by mine having to have it very suddenly and all my plans and hopes went out the window.  I now wished I had read up on c-section just in case to prepare myself.  It wasn't a bad experience but I just wasn't prepared and didn't get the bonding etc I had wanted because I forgot to ask for it (eg I didn't Breastfeed my son until he was about 8 hours old even though I was able to and could have.  I just didn't think about it! )
I'm seriously worried sick about this now.. I'm not ready for any of this :'(

Preeclampsia is a condition of high blood pressure that pregnant women get that causes protein in your urine. I've been monitored for it since I got pregnant and had to do 2 24-hr urine tests since I had chronic hypertension (high blood pressure prior to pregnancy-controlled of course)... the only cure for it is delivery of the baby and it can be very, very serious in some women and threaten both lives if left untreated. .. it sounds like your new doctor is on top of it.... you dont always need a c section with preeclampsia and most women are induced and have vaginal birthsI have known many women who have had to be induced because of preeclampsia and had vaginal births... only 1 needed a c section-- my aunt. Her 7th pregnancy she developed severe preeclampsia at 22 weeks... and had to have an emergency c section at 24 weeks since she got severr toxemia.. they tried keeping her pregnant as long as possible but had to operate because they both almost died... she was very close to getting eclampsia- thank god she didnt... your doctor wont let it get that bad and since your soo close to the end anything that signals preeclampsia and they will induce.1 fingertip is about .5cm dilated

My bp kept going up and up with my first and I had protein in my urine on a few occasions. They sent me to hospital and the consultant said I was on the verge of developing it and gave me some options to either go and have my bp checked every other day at hospital or be induced on my due date. I chose to be induced.if there was cause for huge concern I'm sure you would be in straight away they wouldn't hang about for yours and your babies sake. So I'd try not to panic and wait for your doctor to confirm it. However if your leaking fluid I cant imagine them leaving you to long due to risk of infection. Speak to your midwife and I'm sure she will give you some reassurance. Best of luck x
Sorry Im sooo late .. An to answer your question- No I didnt have a c section thank God I had a normal birth and I took my baby home with me she didnt need to stay in the hospital :-)

I go in for my ultrasound today to check just how much fluid I've been leaking. I'm in furriated that my old Dr knew all this and never told me.. It scares me. I had to do a 24 urine analysis but I had the jug in an ice box and I think it got a little water in it :( I hppeethat doesn't mess up my results. Thanks ladies that have been helpful and kind. I'll post later once I find out my final results. If I do get induced, I'll be 36 a weeks.

question: I had my appointment finally with my new Dr and he told me I may have it and if so have to be induced :( what is it and what was your experience? I'm also leaking amniotic fluid too and have high blood pressure. I was measured at exactly 35 weeks today.
title: pre eclampsia
